title: Realms：做一头熊，打一条龙！
author: S_RwE
txt_content:
The more the bear-ier
好熊——

replies.author: MuChenyu
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢熊！领域服开起来！

replies.author: LocusAzzurro
replies.txt_content:
标题: Realms：做一头熊，打一条龙！ 本帖最后由 LocusAzzurro 于 2016-11-8 13:56 编辑 

BE A BEAR, OR DUEL A DRAGON!
做一头熊，打一条龙！

Marc Watson 2016年11月5日发布




惊喜！如果你是一位PC版Realms的订阅者，今天你就又能玩到些新东西了。上周的万圣节体验内容发布导致发布进度卡住了一些，于是，现在我们又带来了四个你可以马上体验的新鲜地图。
Surprise! If you’re a Realms subscriber on the PC edition of Minecraft, you’ve got some new content today. Releasing a bunch of Halloween experiences last week caused some build-up in the launch tubes, and so we already have four snazzy, new maps for you to dig into.

让我们开始吧！
Let’s get started!

A Giant Quest by Team Wooloo

http://static.hdslb.com/miniloader.swf?aid=6912028&page=4

当一只龙来到你的村庄夺取财宝时，你可以做的只有一件事：变大然后摧毁周围的一切！A Giant Quest是一个简短的单人冒险体验，它会通过一种奇妙的方式改变你对物体大小的认知，在游玩之后你还可以在那个世界中制作自己的村庄。
When a dragon shows up to extort your village for gold, there’s only one thing you can do: get huge and wreck everything! A Giant Quest is a short single-player adventure that plays with your sense of scale in some surprising ways, then afterward, allows you to create your own village in that same world.

Bear Buds by Mithey and Blueloving



在Mithey的动物相关地图系列上继续，我们来到了Bear Buds！作为一只北极熊，带上你的矮人盾和火焰斧去寻找你的父亲吧。我们并不想问太多问题，但是你如果喜欢冒险类游戏元素加上解谜还有北极熊，你一定会爱上这个地图的！
Continuing Mithey’s trend of animal-related maps, we’ve got Bear Buds! You’re a polar bear with a dwarven shield and a flaming ax, off to find your dad. We don’t ask too many questions. If you like adventure gameplay mixed with puzzles and bears, you’re going to love this map!


Color Run by Team Cryus

http://static.hdslb.com/miniloader.swf?aid=6912028&page=5

和一大群朋友玩这个快节奏的小游戏是最好不过的了。叫上大家一起，站在正确的颜色上，否则就会坠入深渊！
This fast-paced minigame is best with a large group of friends. Get everyone together and stand on the proper color, or else you fall to your doom!

Sad Panda Adventures 2 by Mithey and Blueloving

http://static.hdslb.com/miniloader.swf?aid=6912028&page=6

Mithey这周发布了两个地图，这个是最近发布的一个冒险地图的续章！灵感来自于某个捕捉怪物的摄像游戏，这个轨道型射击游戏会上玩家骑上熊猫，穿过五个被恶魂占领的地区。
Mithey has two maps this week, and this one is a sequel to a recently-released adventure! Inspired by a particular monster-catching photography game, this on-rails shooter has players riding pandas through five ghast-infested levels.

越多越熊
The more the bear-ier

这些冒险地图和小游戏现在便可以通过PC版Realms下载，或者你也可以直接从作者那里下载。如果你或你的朋友还没有一个领域，你可以在minecraft.net/realms上了解它。如果你喜欢这些地图，请务必告诉作者们！

These adventure maps and this minigame can be downloaded right now through Minecraft Realms for PC, or directly through their creators. If you or your friends don’t already have a Realm, you can find out loads more at minecraft.net/realms. If you have fun with these, let the creators know all about it!

下次见！
Until next time!

Marc - @Marc_IRL


原文：http://mojang.com/2016/11/be-a-bear-or-duel-a-dragon/
协力：@乙烯_中国
